subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce scored 28 points and Kevin Garnett had 19 points and 10 rebounds against the Hornets on Friday night to lead the Celtics to their 14th consecutive victory.
snippet: Paul Pierce scored 28 points and Kevin Garnett had 19 points and 10 rebounds against the Hornets on Friday night to lead the Celtics to their 14th consecutive victory.
